summary.para: Receives information used to retrieve a stock Shell icon. This structure is used in a call .
The size of this structure, in bytes.
When is called with the SHGSI_ICON flag, this member receives a handle to the icon.
When is called with the SHGSI_SYSICONINDEX flag, this member receives the index of the image in the system icon cache.
When is called with the SHGSI_ICONLOCATION flag, this member receives the index of the icon in the resource whose path is received in szPath.
When is called with the SHGSI_ICONLOCATION flag, this member receives the path of the resource that contains the icon. The index of the icon within the resource is received in iIcon.
